## Exit Criteria

**Epic exits when ALL of the following are true:**

- [ ] All acceptance criteria (AC1-ACN) validated
- [ ] All functional requirements (FR1-FRN) implemented
- [ ] All non-functional requirements (NFR1-NFRN) met
- [ ] All milestones completed
- [ ] Quality standards achieved
- [ ] Integration tests pass
- [ ] Documentation complete
- [ ] Review tasks executed

**Final validation:** [Specific end-to-end test that proves epic complete]
